meanings.definition: To give up something for a greater purpose.
meanings.sent1: She was sacrificing her time to help others in need.
meanings.sent2: People often show kindness by sacrificing their own comfort for someone else.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was sacrificing her favorite toy to make her friend smile.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the character was sacrificing their power to save the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter was sacrificing his safety to rescue the trapped kitten.

meanings.definition: The act of offering something as a sacrifice.
meanings.sent1: The sacrificing of animals was a common practice in ancient rituals.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's tradition included the sacrificing of crops to the gods.
meanings.sent3: The sacrificing of time for a hobby can bring joy and fulfillment.
meanings.sent4: The sacrificing of personal desires for the team's success showed great dedication.
meanings.sent5: The sacrificing of sleep for studying resulted in good grades.

meanings.sent1: He was sacrificing his favorite dessert to stick to his diet.
meanings.sent2: The family was sacrificing their vacation to save money for a new home.
meanings.sent3: Sacrificing a day of fun for a day of hard work can lead to success.
meanings.sent4: She was sacrificing her pride to apologize and mend the relationship.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was sacrificing his free time to train for the upcoming competition.
